patthana15.22:1.1_0: Nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nanahetussa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana15.22:1.1_1: nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa ca nanahetussa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa
patthana15.22:1.1_4: adhipatiyā upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.22:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.22:3.1_0: Hetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.22:3.1_1: Nahetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.22:3.1_2: Hetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca nahetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
